short_summary: Cleaning and janitorial services for the Trois-Rivières Hovercraft Base
description: The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) hovercraft base located at 7100 Du Pont Street, Trois-Rivières, Quebec, is a Department of Fisheries and Oceans facility. The majority of the operations where a maximum number of employees are present are during normal working hours between 7:00 a.m. and 4:30 p.m. The base has two hovercraft hangars, offices, a mechanical room, and a warehouse with an area of 2,309.50 m² and 702.58 m² respectively. The cleaning work must be performed by a contractor who has the necessary skilled labour and equipment. The contractor is required to perform daily, monthly and yearly cleaning tasks. The contract is for a period of one year with an optional two years. The contractor must be able to meet the Canadian Coast Guard's cleaning standards and must have a good understanding of the Coast Guard's policies and procedures. The contractor will be required to provide a detailed cleaning schedule and a plan for meeting the Coast Guard's cleaning standards. The contractor must also be able to provide a detailed breakdown of the costs associated with the cleaning services.

## Tender Title

Janitorial Services at Trois-Rivières Hovercraft Base

## Tender Reference

30003821B

## Tender Description

### Background

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is soliciting bids for janitorial services at the Trois-Rivières Hovercraft Base, a Canadian Coast Guard facility. The base is a 24/7 operation with daily, monthly, and yearly housekeeping needs.

### Objective

The DFO is seeking a contractor to provide janitorial services for the base, including offices, mechanical rooms, and warehouses. The contract duration is from March 1st, 2024 to February 28th, 2025, with optional one-year extensions.

### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes daily, monthly, and yearly housekeeping, including cleaning of offices, mechanical rooms, warehouses, and hovercraft hangars. The contractor must have skilled labor and equipment to perform these tasks.

### Security Requirement

This contract requires a Reliability Status security clearance.

### Trade Agreements

The contract is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Site Visit

A site visit is optional but recommended. The visit will take place on January 12th, 2024, at 14:00 ET, at the West garage of the base.

### Inquiries

Inquiries regarding this tender should be directed to the Contracting Officer, Gloria Tsaka Kipuni, at 343-598-4182 or DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca.

### Documents

The tender documents, including the RFP and the site visit form, are available for download from the Government of Canada’s Buy and Sell website.

### Language of Bid

Bids must be submitted in either English or French.
